subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: C. C. Sabathia pitched seven scintillating innings for the Yankees, while the Mets committed three errors, all in the second inning, in a lopsided game at Citi Field.
snippet: C. C. Sabathia pitched seven scintillating innings for the Yankees, while the Mets committed three errors, all in the second inning, in a lopsided game at Citi Field.
